sentences.en: a mixture of sand and cement
sentences.cn: 沙和水泥的混合物

sentences.en: Beach users have complained about people walking their dogs on the sand.
sentences.cn: 海滩上的游客投诉有人在沙滩上遛狗。

sentences.en: He felt tiny bits of grit and sand peppering his knees.
sentences.cn: 他感到细小的沙砾不断打在膝盖上。

sentences.en: I have sand in my shoe.
sentences.cn: 我的鞋里有沙子。

sentences.en: its privatization programme ran straight into the sand.
sentences.cn: 私有化方案随即终止。

sentences.en: Nearby there is a stretch of white sand beach perfect for sunbathing.
sentences.cn: 附近有一片白色沙滩，是沐日光浴的绝佳场所。

sentences.en: Pendergood had shovelled the sand out of the caravan.
sentences.cn: 彭德古德把旅行拖车里的沙子铲了出来。

sentences.en: Sand the surface softly and carefully.
sentences.cn: 轻轻地、小心地用砂纸打磨表面。

sentences.en: She spread a towel on the sand and lay on it.
sentences.cn: 她在沙滩上铺了一条毛巾，躺在上面。

sentences.en: She thought of the tide rushing in, covering the wet sand.
sentences.cn: 她想象潮汐涌来，淹没潮湿的沙滩。

sentences.en: Simply sand them down with a fine grade of sandpaper.
sentences.cn: 只要用细砂纸把它们打磨一下即可。

sentences.en: The camel's feet, well adapted for dry sand, are useless on mud.
sentences.cn: 骆驼的蹄子虽然非常适合于在干沙上行走，碰到泥泞时却无计可施。

sentences.en: The girls happily played in the sand with buckets and spades.
sentences.cn: 女孩子们拿着桶和铲子在沙滩上快活地玩耍。

sentences.en: The sand martin is a brown bird with white underneath.
sentences.cn: 崖沙燕是一种褐羽白腹的鸟。

sentences.en: The sand on the floor scrunched under our feet.
sentences.cn: 地板上的沙子在我们脚下嘎吱作响。

sentences.en: The ship has come to rest on the fine sand.
sentences.cn: 这艘船停靠在细沙滩上。

sentences.en: They all walked barefoot across the damp sand to the water's edge.
sentences.cn: 他们全都光着脚走过潮湿的沙地来到水边。

sentences.en: Thomas was playing in a little fenced area full of sand.
sentences.cn: 托马斯在一小块围起来的满是沙子的地上玩耍。

sentences.en: Wash them in cold water to remove all traces of sand.
sentences.cn: 用冷水冲洗它们以清除所有的沙子。

sentences.en: We were just sitting on the sand.
sentences.cn: 我们就坐在沙滩上。
